short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TXT Wallpaper turn new tab to HD TXT background. Custom TXT wallpaper background theme for K-pop fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TXT Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle TXT wallpapers each time you open a new tab.
2. Toggle between random and favorite TXT backgrounds in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google Search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media accounts.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel customization for rapid website access.
10. Immediate access to Google applications.
11. Explore more themes with easy access.
12. Simplified sharing options for social media.
13. Download wallpapers quickly.
14. Instant access to gaming options.
15. Activate seasonal animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your TXT new tab.
